original_text: Then David said to all the assembly, “Bless the Lord your God.” And all the assembly blessed the Lord, the God of their fathers, and bowed their heads and paid homage to the Lord and to the king.
korean_text: 다윗이 온 회중에게 이르되 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와를 송축하라 하매 회중이 그의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 송축하고 머리를 숙여 여호와와 왕에게 절하고

sentences.original_text: Then David said to all the assembly,
And all the assembly blessed the Lord, the God of their fathers,
sentences.korean_translation: 온 회중이 그들의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 송축하고

sentences.original_text: and paid homage to the Lord and to the king.
